data.title: James Cronin - Chief Operating Officer at HCCS - Healthcare Coding & Consulting Services
data.meta_description: James Cronin's work experience includes serving as the Chief Operating Officer at Healthcare Coding and Consulting Services (HCCS) since 2010.
data.text:
James Cronin's work experience includes serving as the Chief Operating Officer at Healthcare Coding and Consulting Services (HCCS) since 2010. Prior to that, they worked as a Bar Staff at Finnegan's of Dalkey from 2005 to 2009.

James Cronin began their education in 2005 at the University of Colorado Boulder, where they studied Economics, History, and Business. James attended this institution until 2008, but did not complete a specific degree during this time. In 2008, they transferred to the University of Colorado Denver, where they pursued a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration with an emphasis in Business Marketing, completing their studies in 2009. After a gap in education, James enrolled in The College of St. Scholastica in 2015. Here, they are currently pursuing a Dual Master of Science degree in Health Information Management and Information Technology Leadership, with no specified end year at this time.
